name: 2sWitches
description:
You play as two kinky space witches, sick and tired of an ignorant reality.

You've chosen to conjure a new universe for yourselves and other kinky

space witches. Only when you channel your powers together can you

succeed.[ this game is NotSafeForWork ]

Background Track & General SFX & Art & Programming & Design:

Arielle Grimes

Audio Mixing:

Jane Farless @h34rken / https://twitter.com/h34rken
